name: Rikki & Vikki
description: Puzzling Action for One or Two Players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 Processor: 1.2GHz Intel Pentium III Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectDraw Capable DirectX: Version 7.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct3D 9 Capable DirectX: Version 9.0c
